snippet: The common thread is a closer race, but there are various ways of interpreting all the signs....
abstract: The Upshot; presidential race tightens, with Hillary Clinton's lead over Donald Trump shrinking in national polls since conventions; predictions vary depending on which polls are counted and techniques used by different forecast models.
lead_paragraph: The common thread is a closer race, but there are various ways of interpreting all the signs.

headline.print_headline: As Presidential Race Tightens, Here’s How Forecast Models Differ
headline.main: As Clinton-Trump Race Tightens, Here’s How Forecast Models Differ
